Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from human apolipoprotein E)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22334503]hepatitis C virus(HCVpp):inhibition of infection in Huh7.5.1 cells(IC50>10 Î¼M).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: hEP peptide blocks the binding of virus to cells, suggesting a role of apoE at the very early stage of HCV entry.

Literature.Title: Human apolipoprotein E peptides inhibit hepatitis C virus entry by blocking virus binding.
Literature.Author: Liu S, McCormick KD, Zhao W, Zhao T, Fan D, Wang T.
